New Records: Norman Powell recorded his first career double-double with 31 points and 12 rebounds, surpassing his previous career high of 11 rebounds.
The Los Angeles Clippers improved to 3-0 on the road this season.
Key Match Events: The Sacramento Kings made a late 14-2 burst to tie the game at 98-94 with 2:41 remaining.
Norman Powell drilled a rally-killing 3-pointer 14 seconds later, and Amir Coffey added another trey to extend the lead.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Los Angeles Clippers shot 14-for-30 (46.7 percent) from beyond the arc.
Domantas Sabonis recorded a 23-point, 12-rebound double-double for the Sacramento Kings.
